name: Pizza Maker And Delivery Shop
description:
Be ready to have best fast food making experience.

You will be making paste using eggs flour and other various ingredients to make the paste after that as a factory mechanic or operator you will be operating automated machines to pour the paste into them and making doughs out of them. Making pizza in this pizza maker game is quite easy as you will be using machines to hep you out. Doughs will pass through a machine you will be using its controls to make a flat base of your yummy and delicious pizza.

Assembly line will bake the pizza bread and accumulated it a specific place, where you will be adding mushrooms, vegetables, other kind of organic types. After going through pizza packaging you will driving the pizza car to deliver hot & crispy pizza to the customers and restaurants. Be an expert cooking chef and fulfill the customers demands before the time runs out.

Kids can slice the pizza, put in a box and give it to the delivery dude. Kids can eat their pizza and set a fun table for lunch. So much to do and play in this fun Pizza Maker Crazy Chef game. Kids can cook all day long! And before you eat, don’t forget to show your pizza creation to your friends and family too.


So quench your kitchen fever, like a big factory you will be offering your customers with healthy,nutritious & organic pizzas for breakfast lunch, dinner and midway deals.
